sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Workday Change Review

sys_variable_value.value: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Workday Change Review

Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by  using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Quarterly Workday Change Review.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by 4 - Create Task➛...➛Due date using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here. The Workday Change Review Checklist can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by 4 - Create Task➛...➛Due date using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here. The Workday Change Review Checklist can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com
